A children's book featuring a mouse named Max who lives in a shoe and has various adventures with his shoe-dwelling friends.
A board game where players take on the role of mice living in a shoe, navigating through different rooms and challenges to reach the cheese at the end.
A live-action play where a cast of actors portray mice living in a shoe, performing acrobatic feats and solving puzzles to overcome obstacles.
A video game where players control a mouse navigating through a 3D virtual shoe, solving puzzles and collecting cheese to progress through levels.
A podcast where a host interviews mice living in different shoes around
